### DEFINING SPEC ###

@ns <name> name of the namespace within the API  
@method <method name> [<mpd cmd>=method name] [<bindarg1> <bindarg2> ...]  
@parser <parser> [<parser2> ...]  
@reducer <reducer> [<reducer> ...]  
@error <error> [<error> ...]  
@arguments <arguments> [<arguments> ...]  
@use method
